title: Mapping Australia
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and John Richardson
brief_description: Shows the stages in the production of maps, including aerial photography, ground surveys, and their conversion into map manuscripts. Show relationships of mapping to mineral and industrial development by tracing the stages in aluminium production from the initial discovery of bauxite at Weipa to the production plant at Bell Bay.
